summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5643 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, J. B. Johnson Company's 1st Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue South and 19th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Hinds Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74403, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
